meanings.definition: The quality or state of being kind.
meanings.sent1: Her kindliness towards animals is truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your kindliness in helping me with my homework.
meanings.sent3: The kindliness of the old man made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindliness was like a gentle breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The kindliness of the nurse made the hospital feel like home.

meanings.sent1: He showed his kindliness by helping the elderly lady cross the street.
meanings.sent2: Receiving unexpected kindliness from strangers can truly brighten your day.
meanings.sent3: The kindliness of the stranger who paid for my coffee was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her kindliness was a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The kindliness of the community brought hope to those in need.
